twr.tip.wheel_menu: Press TAB to open the Wheel Menu for Nutrition, Clothing, and customization options.
twr.tip.undead_damage: Is duck_egg a girl or a boy? The mystery remains...
twr.tip.poison_immune: Don't forget to use the Quest Book~
twr.tip.witch_conversion: YueSha believes modpack development should be driven by modding itself.
twr.tip.four_eggs: This modpack is inspired by Frostpunk.
twr.tip.east: Credits to Lyuuke and goumo_g for textures and models.
twr.tip.swamp_slime: Thanks to khjxiaogu for development support.
twr.tip.deflect_ghast_fireballs: Map built by Fu_Yang and 03110. Thank you!
twr.tip.shulker_armor: The Winter Rescue is much less grindy than Terra Firma Rescue.
twr.tip.fossils: You came here on a mission. Don’t forget why.
twr.tip.crouch_blocks: The first Generator heats up a 12-block radius. You can upgrade it later.
twr.tip.smoke_bees: The Generator is a multiblock structure. Use Ponder to learn how to build it.
twr.tip.lava_fuel: Starving? Mix sawdust into your food. It’s not tasty, but it fills you up.
twr.tip.wooden_tool_fuel: Craving hot food? Set up a Crock Pot!
twr.tip.scrap_nuggets: Rye is your first crop — tough, cold-resistant, reliable.
twr.tip.piglin_gold: White turnip may be your only vegetable early on. Treasure it.
twr.tip.dog_health: Click a Crafting Table with a Hammer to unlock new possibilities.
twr.tip.dog_rotten_flesh: Got good specs? We recommend BSL Shaders for a stunning experience.
twr.tip.cooked_drops: Stay near a campfire or Generator to keep your body warm.
twr.tip.nether_sponge: Check your Nutrition balance in your inventory.
twr.tip.boat_passenger: Maintain Nutrition above 50% to increase your health limit. Above 80% or below 20% leads to illness.
twr.tip.shulker_golem: High sugar boosts your speed—but makes you hungrier.
twr.tip.note_block_instrument: High protein levels increase your strength.
twr.tip.zombie_armor: Drink water regularly—purify or boil it first!
twr.tip.undead_helmet: JEI is your best friend. Use R and U to see recipes and usages.
twr.tip.iron_golem_heal: Some foods and drinks can affect your temperature.
twr.tip.turtle_shell: Rumor: dashuaibia never used supporting logs when playing TFC... unless he absolutely had to.
twr.tip.animal_growing: Even great chefs know the secret power of snowballs.
twr.tip.blaze_snowball: Thanks to MoegCraft players for testing and feedback!
twr.tip.biome_bonemeal: Submit bugs or suggestions at: support.teammoeg.com
twr.tip.biome_fishing: Before heading into cold weather or water, prepare—wet clothes lose warmth fast.
twr.tip.fishing_resources: Look for gravel beneath icy riverbeds.
twr.tip.boat_jump: The authors also made Create: Steam Powered.
twr.tip.creeper_cat: Avoid Electrodynamics or Advanced Rocketry — they’re buggy.
twr.tip.water_grass: See a polar bear or wolves and you're unprepared? Don’t fight. Run.
twr.tip.gravity_torch: Provoking wild animals is rarely a good idea.
twr.tip.string_wool: Tier 2 Steam Generators can transfer heat.
twr.tip.barrel: Generators and heat pipes form a thermal energy network.
twr.tip.job_site_dimension: The Heater Vest: your best companion for long journeys.
twr.tip.villager_sweat: Try a cup of steam~ It works wonders.
twr.tip.baby_panda_slimeball: Rumor: traces of humanity lie beneath the bedrock, in the hollows of the Asthenosphere.
twr.tip.fortress_triangulation: Avoid the Survive mod—its code is unstable.
twr.tip.creeper_drops_disc: Submit bugs or ideas at: support.teammoeg.com
twr.tip.mooshroom_lightning: Found a bug? Let us know at: support.teammoeg.com
twr.tip.bed_explode: Send suggestions and issues to: support.teammoeg.com
twr.tip.fall_damage_blocks: Chat with the developers on Discord: https://discord.gg/BWn6E94
twr.tip.bed_respawn: Looking for friends? Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/BWn6E94
twr.tip.ore_tiers: Stay updated—join The Winter Rescue Discord: https://discord.gg/BWn6E94
twr.tip.sponge_bucket: Love The Winter Rescue? Buy us a hot chocolate: https://www.patreon.com/TeamMoegProjects
twr.tip.coarse_to_dirt: Enjoying the modpack? Support us with a coffee: https://www.patreon.com/TeamMoegProjects
twr.tip.enderman_blocks: Feeling cozy? Treat us to a cup of tea: https://www.patreon.com/TeamMoegProjects
twr.tip.dragon_blocks: Still in beta! We welcome all bug reports and feedback.
twr.tip.piglin_repellent: We build with innovation in mind. Support us here: https://www.patreon.com/TeamMoegProjects
